title: Textile, 19th century
medium:
Medium: silk on linen
Technique: embroidered
description: Horizontal rectangle of linen with solidly massed embroidered round blossoms in red silk, outlined in black, against a ground of green. Yellow centers in flowers. Bordering floral rinceau at top.
